blogs.title: Cosmic horseshoe is not the lucky beacon
blogs.summary:
Although the universe started out with a bang it quickly evolved to a relatively cool, dark place. After a few hundred thousand years the lights came back on and scientists are still trying to figure out why.

The Cosmic Horseshoe, as photographed by the H

author.name: The Archaeology News Network
author.description: The Archaeology News Network is a daily updated online newspaper featuring all the latest top stories and headlines relating primarily to Archaeology, Anthropology and Paleontology published on the World Wide Web.
